QuestData.Title: Fragments of the Abyss
QuestData.Description: Our scouts have delivered a disturbing report, champion.$b$bSome of the more powerful creatures of the Void are carrying powerful crystals that augment their abilities. They now pose a greater threat than before, and we can no longer ignore them.$b$bFind these void-tainted monstrosities and take their crystals. We will find a way to dispose of them safely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa <PH SHADOW CRYSTAL THINGS> from Rare Elites on Argus.
